entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
I tried to have an element in my Flexbox layout also be another Flexbox layout. It hurt my brain. I hate Steve.
Had some serious problems reading the code i was asked to copy and paste in the instructions, but with some trial and error and help from the internet i was able to understand it.
Such a fun time learning fetch and post requests
